Comment: Welp, here's some meds we get from Canada we won't be able to buy anymore:  Prescription Medications: Advair Diskus (fluticasone/salmeterol), Flovent (fluticasone), Albuterol inhaler, Amoxil (amoxicillin), and Dexilant (dexlansoprazole).   Over-the-Counter Medications: Tylenol (acetaminophen), Advil (ibuprofen), Aleve (naproxen), Nexium (esomeprazole), and Claritin (loratadine).   To name a few.  Did you know:  **An executive order issued by President Joe Biden in 2021 further opened the path for the FDA to work with states to import prescription drugs from Canada**. Florida became the first state to gain such authorization in January 2024.  Ah, so much winning with tRump.  So much winning.
